name: analyze_accessibility_tool
description: Transforms element extraction results into complete PDF structure trees for accessibility compliance (PDF/UA, WCAG 2.1 AA). Generates semantic tagging (H1-H6, P, Figure, Table, List), establishes reading order, identifies artifacts, creates cross-references, and builds hierarchical structure for screen reader optimization and assistive technology support.

image_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the image. Use this OR image_data, not both.

image_data.description: Base64-encoded image data. Use this OR image_path, not both. Preferred when image is already in memory.

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials
